GameMoveAction - Class in game
A GameMoveAction is an action that is a "move" in a game (as opposed to an administrative action, like "quit game").
GameMoveAction(GamePlayer) - Constructor for class game.GameMoveAction
constructor for GameMoveAction
GameNullAction - Class in game
A GameNullAction is an action that is sent generated automatically whenever a game asks for an action, but no action exists.
GameNullAction(GamePlayer) - Constructor for class game.GameNullAction
Constructor for objects of class GameNullAction
gameOver() - Method in class game.Game

GamePlayer - Interface in game
A player who plays a (generic) game.
GameQuitAction - Class in game
A GameQuitAction is an action that is sent by a player to the game to tell it that it wants to quit the game.
GameQuitAction(GamePlayer) - Constructor for class game.GameQuitAction
Constructor for GameQuitAction
gameStarted - Variable in class game.Game
Tells whether the game has started.
GameState - Class in game
A class that represents the state of a game (e.g., the positions of each piece on a checkerboard together with an indication of whose move it is).
GameState() - Constructor for class game.GameState
 
GameTimer - Class in game
A GameTimer is an object that sends a GameTimerAction to a Game at regular intervals.
GameTimer(Game, int) - Constructor for class game.GameTimer
Constructor for objects of class GameTimer
GameTimerAction - Class in game
An action that indicates that a game's timer has "ticked".
